better-path-resolve

A better path.resolve() that normalizes paths on Windows

Installation

<npm|yarn|pnpm> add better-path-resolve

Usage

'use strict'
const betterPathResolve = require('better-path-resolve')

console.log(betterPathResolve('c:/src'))
//> C:\src

License

MIT © Zoltan Kochan
